name: Ext_R4_Device_de_type
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.Device.deviceName.type for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Device.deviceName.type from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Device|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: udi-label-name | user-friendly-name | patient-reported-name | manufacturer-name | model-name | other
element.definition:
The type of deviceName.
UDILabelName | UserFriendlyName | PatientReportedName | ManufactureDeviceName | ModelName.
element.comment: `Device.deviceName.type` maps to R5 `Device.name.type`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: udi-label-name | user-friendly-name | patient-reported-name | manufacturer-name | model-name | other
element.definition:
The type of deviceName.
UDILabelName | UserFriendlyName | PatientReportedName | ManufactureDeviceName | ModelName.
element.comment: `Device.deviceName.type` maps to R5 `Device.name.type`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: The type of name the device is referred by.
